ALONE_MOVED: Disconnected as there was no one in the target channel.
FORCED: Session ended as I was disconnected.
FORCED_STAGE: Session ended as I was moved to a stage channel that I was not a stage moderator of.
QUEUE_NOT_PLAYING: There is nothing playing right now.
QUEUE_EMPTY: There's nothing left in the queue.
QUEUE_ADDED_MULTI_INSERT: Added **%1** tracks from [**%2**](%3) to start of queue
RESTART: Quaver is restarting and will disconnect.
RESTART_CRASH: Quaver has crashed and will disconnect.
RESTART_QUEUEDATA: Your queue data has been attached.
FILTERS_NOTE: This may take a few seconds to apply
